akn:content.akn:p:
§ 300310. Local government In this division, the term “local government” means a city, county, township, municipality, or borough, or any other general purpose political subdivision of any State. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3189.)
Historical and Revision Notes
RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
30031016 U.S.C. 470w(3).Pub. L. 89–665, title III, § 301(3), as added Pub. L. 96–515, title V, § 501, Dec. 12, 1980, 94 Stat. 3001.
The word “parish” is omitted as unnecessary because of 1 U.S.C. 2.
